languages.text: "Воистину! Творится великое очищение, и все эти несчастные сами навлекли на себя муки! Все пороки, аки полозы, таившиеся во чреве Футфола, выползли наружу, и их встречает праведное пламя воздаяния. Или ты веришь, что ты или я смогли бы лучше рассудить, кто заслуживает кары за свои деяния, а кто нет?"

traits.locale_text: "Творится великое очищение! Ты скажешь, что все эти несчастные не заслуживают мук, которые сами же на себя и навлекли? Все пороки, аки полозы, таившиеся во чреве Футфола, наконец-то выползли наружу, и их встречает праведное пламя воздаяния. Или ты веришь, что ты или я смогли бы лучше рассудить, кто заслуживает кары за свои деяния, а кто нет?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"
languages.original_text: "Воистину! Творится великое очищение, и все эти несчастные сами навлекли на себя муки! Все пороки, аки полозы, таившиеся во чреве Футфола, выползли наружу, и их встречает праведное пламя воздаяния. Или ты веришь, что ты или я смогли бы лучше рассудить, кто заслуживает кары за свои деяния, а кто нет?"

traits.locale_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates had brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or do you imagine you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

languages.text: “我确实支持！大清洗正在进行，所有不幸之人都是在自作自受！那些恶行原本像毒蛇一样潜伏在落脚港，但如今已经大白于天下，等待正义烈焰的惩罚。或者说，莫非你觉得，你我两人更有权决定哪些人应当受到惩罚，哪些人应当赦免？”
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: “我确实支持！大清洗正在进行，所有不幸之人都是在自作自受！那些恶行原本像毒蛇一样潜伏在落脚港，但如今已经大白于天下，等待正义烈焰的惩罚。或者说，莫非你觉得，你我两人更有权决定哪些人应当受到惩罚，哪些人应当赦免？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「そうだ！大いなる浄化が進行中であり、不幸な者たちは皆、自ら苦しみを呼び寄せたのだ！蛇のようにフットフォールの腹に這って行った悪徳達は全員、光の中に出てきた。そして直ぐに、報いの炎に焼かれた。それとも、お前か私なら、誰が罰を受けるべきかのより的確な判断が出来るとでも言うのか？」
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ！大いなる浄化が進行中であり、不幸な者たちは皆、自ら苦しみを呼び寄せたのだ！蛇のようにフットフォールの腹に這って行った悪徳達は全員、光の中に出てきた。そして直ぐに、報いの炎に焼かれた。それとも、お前か私なら、誰が罰を受けるべきかのより的確な判断が出来るとでも言うのか？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Ya lo creo! Se está llevando a cabo una gran limpieza, ¡y todos esos desgraciados se han buscado su propio sufrimiento! Todos los vicios que acechaban como serpientes Paso se han deslizado hacia la luz solo para encontrarse con el fuego justo del castigo. O, ¿cree que usted o yo podríamos juzgar mejor quién merece ser castigado por sus actos y quién no?».
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya lo creo! Se está llevando a cabo una gran limpieza, ¡y todos esos desgraciados se han buscado su propio sufrimiento! Todos los vicios que acechaban como serpientes Paso se han deslizado hacia la luz solo para encontrarse con el fuego justo del castigo. O, ¿cree que usted o yo podríamos juzgar mejor quién merece ser castigado por sus actos y quién no?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Natürlich tue ich das! Eine große Säuberung hat begonnen, und all diese armen Seelen haben dieses Leid selbst über sich hereinbrechen lassen! Alle Laster, die wie Schlangen unter der Oberfläche von Footfall gelauert haben, sind ans Licht gekrochen gekommen — wo sie vom rechtschaffenen Feuer der Vergeltung begrüßt wurden. Oder glaubt Ihr, dass Ihr oder ich besser beurteilen könnten, wer es verdient, für seine Sünden bestraft zu werden, und wer nicht?"
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich tue ich das! Eine große Säuberung hat begonnen, und all diese armen Seelen haben dieses Leid selbst über sich hereinbrechen lassen! Alle Laster, die wie Schlangen unter der Oberfläche von Footfall gelauert haben, sind ans Licht gekrochen gekommen — wo sie vom rechtschaffenen Feuer der Vergeltung begrüßt wurden. Oder glaubt Ihr, dass Ihr oder ich besser beurteilen könnten, wer es verdient, für seine Sünden bestraft zu werden, und wer nicht?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Tout à fait ! L'heure de la purification est venue, et tous ceux qui en souffriront l'auront amplement mérité ! Tout ce qu'elle a fait, c'est châtier comme il se doit les vices qui rampaient tels des serpents dans les entrailles de Castel et qui se sont révélés au grand jour. Mais peut-être pensez-vous que vous ou moi sommes meilleurs juges de qui mérite d'être puni ou non ? »
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait ! L'heure de la purification est venue, et tous ceux qui en souffriront l'auront amplement mérité ! Tout ce qu'elle a fait, c'est châtier comme il se doit les vices qui rampaient tels des serpents dans les entrailles de Castel et qui se sont révélés au grand jour. Mais peut-être pensez-vous que vous ou moi sommes meilleurs juges de qui mérite d'être puni ou non ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Kesinlikle! Büyük bir arındırma gerçekleşiyor. Bütün o nasipsiz kimseler, bu yaşadıkları acılara kendileri sebep oldular! Binliman'ın karnına yılan gibi yerleşmiş olan tüm kötülükler sürünüp gün yüzüne çıkartılıyor, adaletin haklı ateşiyle karşılanıyor. Yoksa senin veya benim, eylemleri nedeniyle kimin cezalandırılıp kimin cezalandırılmayacağına karar verme konusunda daha başarılı olacağımıza mı inanıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "I do indeed! A great cleansing is underway, and all those unfortunates have brought their suffering upon themselves! All of the vices that lurked like serpents in Footfall's belly have slithered out into the light, only to be met with the righteous fire of retribution. Or, do you believe that you or I could be better judges of who deserves to be punished for their deeds and who does not?"

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle! Büyük bir arındırma gerçekleşiyor ve bütün o nasipsiz kişiler, bu yaşadıkları acılara kendileri sebep oldular! Binliman'ın karnına yılan gibi yerleşmiş olan tüm kötülükler sürünüp ışığa çıkartılıyor ve adaletin haklı ateşiyle karşılanıyorlar. Yoksa senin veya benim, eylemleri nedeniyle kimin cezalandırılıp kimin cezalandırılmayacağına karar vermek konusunda daha başarılı olacağımıza mı inanıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
